name: Welcome to the Bikiniverse (beta)
description:
Please give feedback via the comments section!

Welcome to the Bikiniverse has been rebuilt from scratch using the beautiful, elegant, and completely free #defold engine using the Lua programming language. You are playing the very first beta version.

Welcome to the Bikiniverse is a adventure-puzzle game with a completely unique gameplay: using the arrow keys moves both characters at the same time. Guide one of the characters to the donut without letting either character fall into space, and you complete the level. There are 14 puzzles in the first world, including a tutorial.
